title: Pass the AUX
summary: Pass the AUX was a social music controller app where multiple people could play music to a shared "room".
tech_stack: Javascript, NodeJS, MongoDB, Spotify Web API, socket.io
responsibilities: Co-creator and sole backend developer working alongside frontend engineer. Created a NodeJS server that allowed users to play music to a shared "room" using Spotify's web API. Originally implemented using socket.io but later changed to a more traditional REST API approach.
description: A social music controller for iOS
highlights: Built a NodeJS server using Express and MongoDB database
Experimented implementation with socket.io for real time updates to client application
Implemented push notifications with Apple's APNS

title: neildevas.com
summary: neildevas.com is a portfolio website I built for myself to showcase past experiences and work history.
tech_stack: React, GatsbyJS, Adobe XD, Adobe Photoshop, TailwindCSS
responsibilities: Learned UI/UX design and Adobe Photoshop from a Udemy course and learned GatsbyJS framework to create a personal website.
description: This beautiful site you are looking at right now
highlights: Self-taught UI/UX design with Adobe XD and designed website from scratch
